Class VerticalLabelUI

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI

mgui.interfaces.util.VerticalLabelUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class VerticalLabelUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicLabelUI
Extension of BasicLabelUI to allow vertical rendering of text See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/92781/how-do-i-present-text-vertically-in-a-jlabel-java-1-6/92962#92962

1.0
Version:
1.0
